node.text: Get an overview of the designers and artists - such as @AtelierPierreCharpin, @AtangTshikare, @Hang_Jin_ (Jinyeong Yeon) and @JoydeRohanChabot - behind the creative re-imagining of the House's iconic medallion chair for @DiorMaison, currently on display at @ISaloniOfficial in Milan. And click the link in bio to discover more about this unique project.

node.title: Creative re-imaginings of the iconic medallion chair

node.text:
Join @PSG players as they get fitted for the formalwear part of their new wardrobe designed by @MrKimJones,
in a partnership that sees Dior become the football team’s official tailor for the next two seasons. The outfits
comprise a cashmere coat, single-breasted jacket, shirt and pants, along with a pair of black leather ‘Dior
Timeless’ cap-toe derbies whose insoles are silver-tone embossed with each player’s number. A tie woven with a ‘Paris Saint-Germain’ logo, cashmere scarf and reversible black and navy belt complete the looks.
#PSGxDior
© @MelindaTriana

node.text:
“The “Sweet Love” rose was the creative starting point for this new Eau de Parfum. I wanted to surround it with flowers and thereby obtain a bouquet that was both vivid and elegant, sensual yet weightless.”
- François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator

node.title: The new Miss Dior Eau de Parfum

node.text:
‘Game of Notes’ is the encounter between two exceptional men who freely discuss their creative inspiration. Like a late-night talk show; lively and spontaneously.
The new Sauvage fragrance is coming soon.
•
#DiorBeauty #DiorParfums #DiorSauvage

node.text:
Passing down the French horticultural rose know-how, #DiorPrestige is honored to partner with l’Association des Amis d’André Eve. An avant-garde ingenious rose-breeder, his garden is the fruit of 40 years of passion for roses. A true sanctuary protecting the most exceptional floral species, including the wild ancestor of the Rose de Granville
•
#BeautyAsALegacy #DiorBeauty #DiorSkincare @diorbeauty

node.title: THE ORIGINS OF THE ROSE DE GRANVILLE

node.text:
Uncover the elaborate design process and #DiorSavoirFaire behind #DiorSignature sunglasses by @MariaGraziaChiuri, a collaboration between the #DiorEyewear design studio and the specialized expertise of @TheliosOfficial that progressed from technical drawings through initial prototypes and onto the finalized and produced pieces with their characteristic golden detailing and 1970s aesthetic.
© Video: @MelindaTriana 
Photo: @Valentin_Hennequin

node.text:
Actress @Efira_Virginie wore a #DiorCouture white silk chiffon draped dress by @MariaGraziaChiuri to attend the Dior x @VogueParis dinner held during the 74th @FestivaldeCannes. Swipe to see other #StarsinDior at the event - from @SandrineKiberlain and jury member @MGyllenhaal to @MelanieThierry, @GadElmaleh and @JeanneDamas - talk about their experience at the famous film festival.
#DiorCannes
© Photo: @Pierre__Mouton
Video : @Dnl.Darmon

node.title: Cannes Glamour at the Dior x Vogue Paris Dinner

•
#diormakeup #DiorCouture

node.text:
Every day starts with a good breakfast, but for actress and @DiorMakeup face @CaraDelevingne, this is no ordinary day - it's the unveiling of the #DiorCouture Autumn-Winter 2021-2022 collection by @MariaGraziaChiuri. Accompany her as she gets ready in her plush #DiorChezMoi robe, having fun choosing her beauty look for the day, nipping backstage to @PeterPhilipsMakeup for a final professional finish, and sharing her post-show thoughts.
© Film by @MelindaTriana

node.text:
The book 'Threads of Life: A History of the World Through the Eye of a Needle' proved a starting point for @MariaGraziaChiuri spark for the #DiorCouture Autumn-Winter 2021-2022 collection. And here its author @SewingMatters discusses the overlooked importance of sewing as a millennia-old form of visual communication, a repository for ideas of identity and place, and a means of connecting people and of sharing ideas around the world. 
© Clare Hunter is a community textile artist, curator & author based in Scotland. Threads of Life is published by Sceptre, Hodder & Stoughton (UK), Abrams Press (US), Bollati Boringhieri (Italy) & Uitgeverij Balans (Amsterdam).

node.title: Reclaiming the outsized role of sewing

node.text:
Uncover the awesome effort required to realize the 340m2 of embroideries that lined the show space for the unveiling of the #DiorCouture Autumn-Winter 2021-2022 collection by @MariaGraziaChiuri. The motifs of artist Eva Jospin's work, 'Chambre de Soie', were divided into panels and interpreted as free-flowing embroideries involving 150 different kinds of stitches and techniques, and undertaken by 300 artisans at the @Chanakya.School in Mumbai, India. Founded in 2017 by the @Chanakya.In ateliers, the school preserves exceptional techniques and empowers women in local communities by training them as master craftspeople, in India a role traditionally reserved for men. This collection is thus a celebration of the transmission and richness of savoir-faire, a collective work glorifying the borderless beauty of craft. 
© Film by @MelindaTriana

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Dior Official on September 15, 2021 tagging @brooklynmuseum, and @hereandnowagency. May be an image of indoor.

node.text:
The House's multiple sources of inspiration – from Versailles to the splendor of gardens – are spotlighted in the thematic itinerary of the #DiorDesignerofDreams exhibition in New York's @BrooklynMuseum until February 20, 2022. One of the most fascinating focuses is the Colorama room, a magical cabinet of curiosities aweing with pointillistic hues. Alongside miniature models of dresses, and illustrations by artists such as René Gruau and Mats Gustafson, the room reveals the essential role of Dior accessories, from makeup to perfumes, including hats by @StephenJonesMillinery.
© @HereandNowAgency

node.text:
At the #DiorDesignerofDreams exhibition in New York's @BrooklynMuseum, the Dior Ateliers gallery present toiles from the House's collections. All made in white cotton canvas, they highlight the importance of the ateliers and the #DiorSavoirFaire of the petites mains working there, without whom none of these splendid haute couture creations would ever be possible.
© @HereandNowAgency

node.text:
Discover the scenography of the #DiorDesignerofDreams exhibition, newly opened at the @BrooklynMuseum in New York and running until February 20, 2022. In a new narrative specially adapted for both location and city, this event crowns more than seventy years of virtuoso creation initiated by the pioneering vision of Christian Dior himself. The fifth international iteration of this stunning retrospective, which debuted in Paris in 2017, the exhibition offers an in-depth and inspiring journey through the history of the House of Dior, from the first collection known as the New Look in February 1947 to the present day. Curated by Florence Müller in collaboration with @Matthew_Yokobosky, the museum's Senior Curator of Fashion and Material Culture, and designed by scenographer Nathalie Crinière (@Agence_NC_Nathalie_Criniere), swipe to see an interpretation by @MariaGraziaChiuri of the iconic 'Miss Dior' dress as well as a section of the room examining the influence of Versailles.
© Photos: @HereandNowAgency.

node.text:
The Miss Dior ‘Millefiori Garden' is ready to take over 6 different cities with an exclusive pop-up experience that invites you to immerse into the unique universe of Miss Dior. Are you ready to wake up?
•
#DiorBeauty #DiorParfums #MissDior #WakeUpForLove

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Dior Official on September 12, 2021 tagging @mrkimjones, and @pietrocastellitto. May be an image of 1 person, standing, suit and indoor.

node.text:
At the 78th Venice International Film Festival, actor @PietroCastellitto attended the 'Freaks Out' photocall in a blue suit with white shirt and black derbies. Meanwhile, at the 47th Deauville American Film Festival, singer and jury member Antoine Lomepal opted for a black Modern Tailoring suit with a black turtleneck. And, back in Venice, @VincentLindon wore a black shawl collar tuxedo, white cotton shirt, black silk tie and leather derbies. All by @MrKimJones.
#StarsinDior

node.text:
At the 78th Venice International Film Festival, #PeterSarsgaard was in a navy shawl collar tuxedo, white cotton shirt and a black bow tie for the premiere of 'The Lost Daughter', while @QuimYo wore a navy peak lapel suit with black leather derbies. Actor @JohnnyDepp attended the screening of 'City of Lies' at the 47th Deauville American Film Festival wearing a Dior men's navy shawl collar tuxedo with classic white cotton shirt. All looks by @MrKimJones.
#StarsinDior

node.text:
At 78th Venice International Film Festival,  @DuneMovie director Denis Villeneuve wore a Dior men's collection black peak lapel tuxedo, black cotton shirt, silk tie and patent leather derbies, while actor @IsraelElejalde attended the 'Parallel Mothers' premiere in a black Tailleur Oblique tuxedo, white cotton shirt and black patent leather derbies, all by @MrKimJones.
#StarsinDior
